title: The Michael Singer Podcast: Season 2 Trailer
description:
Are you ready for even more of Michael Singer’s signature wit and wisdom? Check out this audio trailer from Sounds True founder Tami Simon, announcing the second season of The Michael Singer Podcast!

Join us on March 28 for the first of five new episodes of this acclaimed podcast.
